message.nexus.nexus.desc: Can be used for team based tower defense games. That team whose nexus is destroyed loses!
message.nexus.gamemode_line_2.desc: > Place one Nexus in each team base.
message.nexus.gamemode_line_4.desc: > Assign a color to the team: /team modify <team> color [color]
message.nexus.gamemode_line_5.desc: > Assign all players to the teams: /team join <team> [playerName]
message.nexus.gamemode_line_6.desc: > Play! The goal of gamemode is to destroy the other teams's Nexus.
